articles.title: Study finds humans were making fire 400,000 years ago, far earlier than once thought - AP News
articles.description: Archaeologists in Britain say they have found the earliest known evidence of deliberate fire-making, dating to around 400,000 years ago. The findings published in the journal Nature predate previous evidence by about 350,000 years. The team identified heated …

articles.title: Japan lifts tsunami advisory after 6.7-magnitude earthquake - BBC
articles.description: The quake struck the country's north just days after a 7.5-magnitude earthquake in the same region injured 50 people.

articles.title: Trump asserts he has pardoned county clerk convicted in Colorado case - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump says he has pardoned Tina Peters, a major cause for MAGA supporters. She was convicted in state court, and it’s unclear if his act has any impact.

articles.title: 'Doesn't look good': Sherrone Moore sits in jail as Michigan tackles another scandal - The Detroit News
articles.description: What unfolded over the past 24 hours has made national and even global headlines involving college football's all-time winningest program.

articles.title: The Game Awards 2025 – Every Winner and Xbox Reveal Plus New Details on Control Resonant, Diablo IV, Tomb Raider, and More - Xbox Wire
articles.description: On behalf of the creative teams at Xbox, Bethesda Softworks, Activision, and Blizzard, we extend our heartfelt congratulations to this year’s winners and nominees at The Game Awards!

articles.title: ‘RHOSLC’ star Jen Shah cries during emotional reunion with family after prison release - Page Six
articles.description: Shah was picked up by her husband and sons after being released early from the Federal Prison Camp, Bryan in Texas.

articles.title: Trump signs order blocking states from enforcing own AI rules - BBC
articles.description: California's governor Gavin Newsom issued a strongly-worded statement in response to the executive order.

articles.title: The man accused of killing Charlie Kirk appears in court for first time as a judge weighs media access - Politico
articles.description: Attorneys for defendant Tyler Robinson pushed to further limit media access in the high-profile criminal case.

articles.title: Broadcom stock reverses lower on a misinterpretation of what the CEO said on the earnings call - CNBC
articles.description: Investors were apparently not satisfied with Broadcom CEO Hock Tan's answer to an important question.

articles.title: Six injured in Hayward explosion after construction crew strikes gas line - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: Six people were injured and three buildings were destroyed in an explosion and fire near Hayward in Alameda County.

articles.title: Bucs’ special teams mistake leads to Falcons’ TD - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Buccaneers, who led 7-0, stopped the Falcons on third down in the red zone.

articles.title: Mike Johnson says boat strike hit "able-bodied" survivors, operation "entirely appropriate" - CBS News
articles.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson told reporters he's satisfied with the intelligence and legality of the operation that killed two survivors of a U.S. strike on an alleged drug boat.

articles.title: US and Japan hold joint flight drills as China ups military activity near Japan - AP News
articles.description: U.S. strategic bombers joined Japanese fighter jets in a joint military exercise around Japan's airspace. It followed a joint flight by Chinese and Russian bombers near western Japan, which prompted Tokyo to scramble its jets. The Japanese air force and U.S. …

articles.title: Skydiver dangles from plane in midair after parachute mishap in Australia, video shows - CBS News
articles.description: The skydiver survived after sawing through the tangled lines with a hook knife and landing safely with only minor injuries.

articles.title: Do Kwon: TerraUSD creator sentenced to 15 years in prison over $40bn crash - BBC
articles.description: In August, Do Kwon pleaded guilty to conspiracy to defraud and wire fraud and apologised for his actions.

articles.title: Google launched its deepest AI research agent yet — on the same day OpenAI dropped GPT-5.2 - TechCrunch
articles.description: For the first time, developers can embed Google's Deep Research tool, based on Gemini 3 Pro, into their own apps.

articles.title: ‘We don’t have a lot of time’: Congress comes to terms with an all-but-certain lapse in Obamacare subsidies - Politico
articles.description: Some Republicans are scrambling to see if a deal can come together in the final weeks of 2025, but most are skeptical.
